name: Laravel 8 备忘清单
title: Laravel 8 备忘清单是最好的 Laravel 代码段和备忘清单参考

cards.title: 简介
cards.body: Laravel 8 备忘清单是最好的 Laravel 代码段和备忘清单参考

cards.title: Composer
cards.code:
$ composer create-project laravel/laravel folder_name
$ composer install
$ composer update
$ composer dump-autoload [--optimize]
$ composer self-update
$ composer require [options] [--] [vender/packages]...

cards.title: Config
Environment
Log 日志
URL
Event
Pagination
Lang
File

cards.code:
SSH::put($localFile, $remotePath);
SSH::putString($string, $remotePath);

cards.title: Cookie
Cache
Session
Response
Request
Container
Redirect
Queue

cards.code:
php artisan queue:listen
php artisan queue:listen connection
php artisan queue:listen --timeout=60
# 只处理队列中的第一个作业
php artisan queue:work
# 以守护进程模式启动一个队列工作者
php artisan queue:work --daemon
# 为失败的作业创建迁移文件
php artisan queue:failed-table
# 列出失败的工作
php artisan queue:failed
# 通过 id 删除失败的作业
php artisan queue:forget 5
# 删除所有失败的作业
php artisan queue:flush

cards.title: View
Validation
Rules
cards.body:
• accepted
• active_url
• after:YYYY-MM-DD
• before:YYYY-MM-DD
• alpha
• alpha_dash
• alpha_num
• array
• between:1,10
• confirmed
• date
• date_format:YYYY-MM-DD
• different:fieldname
• digits:value
• digits_between:min,max
• boolean
• email
• exists:table,column
• image
• in:foo,bar,...
• not_in:foo,bar,...
• integer
• numeric
• ip
• max:value
• min:value
• mimes:jpeg,png
• regex:[0-9]
• required
• required_if:field,value
• required_with:foo,bar,...
• required_with_all:foo,bar,...
• required_without:foo,bar,...
• required_without_all:foo,bar,...
• same:field
• size:value
• timezone
• unique:table,column,except,idColumn
• url

cards.title: Form
Form%20Elements
cards.code: Form%3A%3Alabel('id'%2C%20'Description')%3B%0AForm%3A%3Alabel('id'%2C%20'Description'%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'foo'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atext('name')%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atext('name'%2C%20%24value)%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atext('name'%2C%20%24value%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atextarea('name')%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atextarea('name'%2C%20%24value)%3B%0AForm%3A%3Atextarea('name'%2C%20%24value%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Ahidden('foo'%2C%20%24value)%3B%0AForm%3A%3Apassword('password')%3B%0AForm%3A%3Apassword('password'%2C%20array('placeholder'%20%3D%3E%20'Password'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Aemail('name'%2C%20%24value%2C%20array())%3B%0AForm%3A%3Afile('name'%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Acheckbox('name'%2C%20'value')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E8%A2%AB%E9%80%89%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E5%A4%8D%E9%80%89%E6%A1%86%0AForm%3A%3Acheckbox('name'%2C%20'value'%2C%20true%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Aradio('name'%2C%20'value')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%94%9F%E6%88%90%E9%80%89%E5%AE%9A%E7%9A%84%E6%97%A0%E7%BA%BF%E7%94%B5%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%0AForm%3A%3Aradio('name'%2C%20'value'%2C%20true%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Aselect('name'%2C%20array('key'%20%3D%3E%20'value'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Aselect('name'%2C%20array('key'%20%3D%3E%20'value')%2C%20'key'%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3AselectRange('range'%2C%201%2C%2010)%3B%0AForm%3A%3AselectYear('year'%2C%202011%2C%202015)%3B%0AForm%3A%3AselectMonth('month')%3B%0AForm%3A%3Asubmit('Submit!'%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Abutton('name'%2C%20array('class'%20%3D%3E%20'name'))%3B%0AForm%3A%3Amacro('fooField'%2C%20function()%0A%7B%0Areturn%20'%3Cinput%20type%3D%22custom%22%2F%3E'%3B%0A%7D)%3B%0AForm%3A%3AfooField()%3B

cards.title: String
cards.code:
// 将 UTF-8 值音译为 ASCII
Str::ascii($value)
Str::camel($value)
Str::contains($haystack, $needle)
Str::endsWith($haystack, $needles)
// 用给定值的单个实例来限制字符串。
Str::finish($value, $cap)
Str::is($pattern, $value)
Str::length($value)
Str::limit($value, $limit = 100, $end = '...')
Str::lower($value)
Str::words($value, $words = 100, $end = '...')
Str::plural($value, $count = 2)
// 生成更真实的“随机”字母数字字符串。
Str::random($length = 16)
// 生成“随机”字母数字字符串。
Str::quickRandom($length = 16)
Str::upper($value)
Str::title($value)
Str::singular($value)
Str::slug($title, $separator = '-')
Str::snake($value, $delimiter = '_')
Str::startsWith($haystack, $needles)
// 将值转换为大写大小写。
Str::studly($value)
Str::macro($name, $macro)

cards.title: Blade
HTML
基本数据库使用
查询生成器

cards.code:
DB::table('users')
      ->join('contacts', 'users.id', '=', 'contacts.user_id')
      ->join('orders', 'users.id', '=', 'orders.user_id')
      ->select('users.id', 'contacts.phone', 'orders.price')
      ->get();

cards.title: Aggregates
原始表达式
Inserts 插入
Updates 更新
Deletes 删除
Unions 联合
Input
Session Input (flash)
Files
Route
RESTful 控制器
触发错误
路由参数
cards.code:
Route::get('foo/{bar}', function($bar){});
Route::get('foo/{bar?}', function($bar = 'bar'){});

cards.title: HTTP 动词
Secure Routes(TBD)
cards.code: Route::get('foo', array('https', function(){}));

cards.title: 路由约束
HTTP 中间件
cards.code:
// 为路由分配中间件
Route::get('admin/profile', ['middleware' => 'auth', function(){}]);

cards.title: 命名路由
%E8%B7%AF%E7%94%B1%E5%89%8D%E7%BC%80
cards.code: Route%3A%3Agroup(%5B'prefix'%20%3D%3E%20'admin'%5D%2C%20function()%0A%7B%0A%20%20Route%3A%3Aget('users'%2C%20function()%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20return%20'Matches%20The%20%22%2Fadmin%2Fusers%22%20URL'%3B%0A%20%20%7D)%3B%0A%7D)%3B

cards.title: 路由命名空间
cards.code:
// 该路由组将携带命名空间“Foo\Bar”
Route::group(array('namespace' => 'Foo\Bar'), function(){})

cards.title: 子域路由
cards.code:
// {sub} 将被传递给闭包
Route::group(array('domain' => '{sub}.example.com'), function(){});

cards.code: %2F%2F%20%E5%B0%86%E5%80%BC%E8%BD%AC%E6%8D%A2%E4%B8%BA%E9%A9%BC%E5%B3%B0%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%8F%E5%86%99%0Acamel_case(%24value)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E8%8E%B7%E5%8F%96%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%AF%B9%E8%B1%A1%2F%E7%B1%BB%E7%9A%84%E7%B1%BB%E2%80%9Cbasename%E2%80%9D%0Aclass_basename(%24class)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E8%BD%AC%E4%B9%89%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%0Ae('%3Chtml%3E')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BB%A5%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%AD%90%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E5%BC%80%E5%A4%B4%0Astarts_with('Foo%20bar.'%2C%20'Foo')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BB%A5%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E5%AD%90%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E7%BB%93%E5%B0%BE%0Aends_with('Foo%20bar.'%2C%20'bar.')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E5%B0%86%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E8%BD%AC%E6%8D%A2%E4%B8%BA%E8%9B%87%E5%BD%A2%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%8F%E5%86%99%0Asnake_case('fooBar')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E6%95%B0%0Astr_limit()%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E5%8C%85%E5%90%AB%E7%BB%99%E5%AE%9A%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%90%E5%AD%97%E7%AC%A6%E4%B8%B2%0Astr_contains('Hello%20foo%20bar.'%2C%20'foo')%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%EF%BC%9Afoo%2Fbar%2F%0Astr_finish('foo%2Fbar'%2C%20'%2F')%3B%0Astr_is('foo*'%2C%20'foobar')%3B%0Astr_plural('car')%3B%0Astr_random(25)%3B%0Astr_singular('cars')%3B%0Astr_slug(%22Laravel%205%20Framework%22%2C%20%22-%22)%3B%0A%2F%2F%20%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%EF%BC%9AFooBar%0Astudly_case('foo_bar')%3B%0Atrans('foo.bar')%3B%0Atrans_choice('foo.bar'%2C%20%24count)%3B
